guardian.title: Jon Stewart to leave The Daily Show after surprise announcement
guardian.topComment: There will never be another Jon Stewart. Take a hiatus and come back in three years, Jon.

guardian.title: Isis war to extend far beyond Iraq and Syria under Obama plan
guardian.topComment: At some point, perhaps the voting classes will wake up to realize people like Obama have no plan, just as W had no plan, and Clinton had no plan, etc.

guardian.title: Bank could yet be prosecuted, says Loretta Lynch
guardian.topComment: Heck, if the Supreme Court has ruled that corporations can have the same rights as individuals in regards to both religious convictions as well as campaign financing, then the actual individuals within these corporations should be held as accountable...

guardian.title: Fifty Shades of Grey: some pleasure, occasional pain
guardian.topComment: I think of this film title when I look down at my pubes.

guardian.title: Racial fear has infected US politics, Axelrod says
guardian.topComment: I'm glad Axelrod is finally stating the obvious--all of the denial over this issue has been mind-boggling. Membership in white supremacist groups spiked after Obama took office, and the dog whistles from Republicans and the right wing have become dea...
